pages.title: Barks
pages.text: The process of extracting (l:resources/bark)bark$() from a log requires a delicate instrument, and a sword is far too long and imprecise. Instead, druids use $(l:apparatus/knives)knives$() for the process of carving bark from trees.

pages.title: Runes
pages.text: The same tools can also be used specifically, allowing a druid to carve enchanted runes into both bark and runestone alike, allowing energy of both this world and the fay to flow through the ancient symbol.$(br2)Examples of this process of "Runic Carving" can be found in the "Runes" chapter of this book.
